author: ericcano
body:
This ensures compatibility with alpaka 1.1 and all GPU architecture where warp level primitives have undefined behavior if called from incomplete warps (in practice, the kernel hangs).

#### PR description:

This PR fixes the lockups in prefixScan when using Alpaka 1.1 as mentioned in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/8957

#### PR validation:

The locking issue was reproduced when running against Alapaka 1.1 and fixed by ensuring only full warps call `alpaka::warp::shfl()`.
title: Ensures that warp level primitives are called from full warps in prefixScan.
